article: Disneyland opened on July 17, 1955 and instantly became the world's most recognizable and popular theme park. This was the only Disney theme park visited by Walt Disney, who died in 1966. Disneyland is _ in the south of Los Angeles, California. You may get there by air or by bus.  Disneyland _ most of its visitors from _ . So avoid weekends and school vacations to get the _ waits. The period before or after Christmas Day is the busiest of the _ , with the park often holding more extra guests each day. Whenever you visit, _ early -- about an hour _ the opening time -- to get the popular attractions before crowds _ .  Disneyland also _ tickets online, but does not allow you to _ them at home. So you'll have to order far enough in advance for them to arrive by mail. Tickets _ also be available through your local auto club, Disney Store or your school or work activities office.  Space Mountain 53 _ in early July, 2005 after a two-year rehab to rebuild the track and improve show _ . If you are travelling with little kids, you'll want to visit Fantasyland first in the morning, as several popular kids' rides in that area, _ Dumbo and Peter Pan, have low capacities and build long _ early in the day. If not , head west to Adventureland and New Orleans Square _ the park opens, visiting the Indiana Jones Adventure and Splash Mountain, _ coming back to the Haunted Mansion and Pirates of the Caribbean.
